name: open-in-rdio
title: Open in Rdio
description: Open Rdio links in the native Rdio app
author: Jannis Leidel

preferences.name: addInlineButton
preferences.title: Adds a button on the Rdio pages directly.
preferences.description: When clicked this will open the Rdio app.

preferences.name: addBarButton
preferences.title: Adds a button on the status/menu bar.
preferences.description: When clicked this will open the Rdio app.

preferences.name: autoOpen
preferences.title: Automatically open Rdio app
preferences.description: When enabled this will automatically open the Rdio app. If disabled you can use the icon in the status bar.

preferences.name: closeTab
preferences.title: Automatically close tab
preferences.description: When enabled this will automatically close the tab with the Rdio URL in.
